about_the_game:
Mechanical Trap is a 2D horizontal tower defense game with gravity effects, with a variety of defense towers to collect and use together, a rich map, each enemy has a different way of restraining, and each defense tower has a different function.Each map has a different way to pass, and it is very challenging, do you dare to accept the challenge? (The current trial version does not support other languages other than Chinese, but you only need to know the instructions to play the whole game normally :[W/A/S/D]: Move the lens, [F1]: Open basic Settings.(adjust volume/screen size), [F4]: Full screen, [space bar] Quick return to base, [right mouse button]: Desselect)

Game features

Multiple traps can be unlocked and used in combination, each with different advantages on different terrain! There are also a variety of levels and special map blocks, each level has a different way to pass, and each enemy has a different way to deal with! Looking forward to your challenge!(This is demonstrated in the second video [Mechanism Demo] on this page.)
detailed_description:
【How do I switch to English？】

In the Game press "F1" > Click "设置(setting)" in the upper left corner > Click "游戏屏幕设置(Game screen setup)" > in the "语言(language)"Select "English"> Click" 确定(OK)"
